title: [Health] Highest omega-3 levels cut death risk by 13%. Research was adjusted for multiple personal factors, scientists believe that these are the strongest data published to date supporting the view that over the long-term, having higher blood omega-3 levels can help maintain better overall health.

[Neuroscience] Women who have migraine before menopause may have an increased risk of developing high blood pressure after menopause. Researchers also found the risk of developing high blood pressure was similar in women with migraine with aura and without.
